campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in the forest of Athel Loren.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in the forest of Athel Loren.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Most travellers that enter Athel Loren are found on its outskirts as little more than gibbering wrecks, their sanity shredded by whatever horrors they witnessed in the magical forest.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Most travellers that enter Athel Loren are found on its outskirts as little more than gibbering wrecks, their sanity shredded by whatever horrors they witnessed in the magical forest.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: This settlement is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is under siege.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: This settlement is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is under siege.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The population of this besieged settlement is dying from malnutrition.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The population of this besieged settlement is dying from malnutrition.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: This army is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is laying siege.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: This army is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is laying siege.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Besieging a settlement also takes its toll on the besiegers, as disease and small skirmishes claim the weak.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Besieging a settlement also takes its toll on the besiegers, as disease and small skirmishes claim the weak.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: This port is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is being blockaded.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: This port is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is being blockaded.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Without supplies coming in from sea trade routes this settlement grows hungry.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Without supplies coming in from sea trade routes this settlement grows hungry.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: This fleet is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is blockading.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: This fleet is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is blockading.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Everyone suffers during a lengthy blockade. Keeping the fleet out to sea hurts everyone.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Everyone suffers during a lengthy blockade. Keeping the fleet out to sea hurts everyone.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in areas with high [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in areas with high [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]]Chaos corruption.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Blighted by the forces of Chaos, the ground has become hard as iron and the howling winds cut like daggers of purest cold.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Blighted by the forces of Chaos, the ground has become hard as iron and the howling winds cut like daggers of purest cold.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in the Chaos Wastes.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in the Chaos Wastes.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: To travel through the Chaos Wastes is to invite madness, for no mortal can comprehend them.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: To travel through the Chaos Wastes is to invite madness, for no mortal can comprehend them.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Fleets will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in deep waters.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Fleets will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in deep waters.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The elements show their true power over deep waters, endlessly buffeting the fleet and bringing death to mariners.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The elements show their true power over deep waters, endlessly buffeting the fleet and bringing death to mariners.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in desert regions.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in desert regions.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: All perish in the desert! A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: All perish in the desert! A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies that cannot be sustained will suffer [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses through desertion.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies that cannot be sustained will suffer [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses through desertion.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Without supplies to sustain them, starvation, disease or desertion is causing troops to suffer [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Without supplies to sustain them, starvation, disease or desertion is causing troops to suffer [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: placeholder

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Disease brings suffering and death to all mortal armies. Appease the gods through sacrifice for the offence!

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Disease brings suffering and death to all mortal armies. Appease the gods through sacrifice for the offence!

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Horde armies positioned in close proximity will begin infighting, and suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Horde armies positioned in close proximity will begin infighting, and suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The rivalry between two mighty hordes has reached a tipping point. The warriors have began fighting each other!

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The rivalry between two mighty hordes has reached a tipping point. The warriors have began fighting each other!

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition whilst crossing mountain passes.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition whilst crossing mountain passes.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The mountain takes its toll. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The mountain takes its toll. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Undead armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in territory controlled by the living.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Undead armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in territory controlled by the living.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The lands of the living offer no sanctuary for the dead. Vanhel’s curse is upon us, make haste through this territory or they will revert to lifeless corpses.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The lands of the living offer no sanctuary for the dead. Vanhel’s curse is upon us, make haste through this territory or they will revert to lifeless corpses.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when they do not control a home region.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when they do not control a home region.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: With no region to call home, this force is suffering from [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: With no region to call home, this force is suffering from [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: This army has been sabotaged; many have lost their lives.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: This army has been sabotaged; many have lost their lives.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in frozen regions.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in frozen regions.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The cold makes corpses. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The cold makes corpses. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in swamp lands.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in swamp lands.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: This mire claims the unwary. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: This mire claims the unwary. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.

campaign_map_tooltip.last_approved_text: Mortal armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in Undead territory or areas with high [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]]Vampiric corruption.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Mortal armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in Undead territory or areas with high [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]]Vampiric corruption.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: Lands under the dominion of a Vampire take on a dread aspect – there is no sustenance here for the living, as their very life essence is leeched from their bodies.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: Lands under the dominion of a Vampire take on a dread aspect – there is no sustenance here for the living, as their very life essence is leeched from their bodies.

campaign_map_attritions.campaign_map_tooltip: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in barren wasteland.

unit_card_tooltip.last_approved_text: The barren wastelands are vast, hostile and food is scarce - such inhospitable lands are not meant for the living.

campaign_map_attritions.unit_card_tooltip: The barren wastelands are vast, hostile and food is scarce - such inhospitable lands are not meant for the living.
